name: goCorona
description:
It's a casual fun game where you jump from one cell to another and kill viruses. There are different types of cells infected with viruses, play to know more.

It's simplicity will make you addictive and you will want to play again and again.

You can compete with other players on leaderboard and the best part about this leaderboard is that it's a weekly leaderboard means it resets every week, so every player is having chance to rank #1 on leaderboard.
